items.name: On Get in touch page sending a message must be possible.
'-Register' and '-Login' functions - These tests covers the verification of features accessible directly from https://lennertamas.github.io/roxo/index.html url. Also verifies the url is correct.
'Registration' functions - These tests covers the verifications of registration related features and page behaviours.
When on landing page, the 'Home' button must navigate to the correct url.
'Terms and conditions' functions - These tests covers the verification of 'Terms and conditions' functions.
'Scrolling through multi pages' functions - These tests covers the verification of scrolling through multiple pages.
